1590010.name: Re-Spawn Tournament
1590010.description:
Please don't buy the game!

We are currently undergoing a massive rewrite of the code base and have subsequently stopped development on the old code base.

Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled showdown with Re-Spawn Tournament, the competitive arena-style multiplayer first-person shooter game. Experience fast-paced, high-energy combat that demands both reflexive skill and tactical thinking. Battle it out with friends and foes alike in intense matches where every second counts, and every shot can mean the difference between victory and defeat. With a variety of weapons, maps, and game modes to choose from, Re-Spawn Tournament offers endless re-playability and endless thrills.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and emerge victorious as the ultimate champion?

Features

  • Multiplayer Game Modes - Conquest, Capture the Flag, Rush, Team Deathmatch, Free for All, and Kill Confirmed.
  • Weapons & Control - First Person, Third Person, Dynamic Crosshair, Leaning, Weapon Sway, Knife & Grenade, Fire modes (burst, auto, & semi).
  • Ballistics - Bullet Drop, Bullet Penetration, and Recoil.
  • Gameplay - Global/Team Chat, Sniper Scope, A.I. players (Bots), Hit marker, Kill feed, Melee, Compass, and Class & Perk selection.

More features will be added as the game develops!
1590010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
